Description_lang: Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for ${$s2/1000} sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by $s1% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by $s3%.

description_blz.en_US: Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
description_blz.es_MX: Los Capullos de chi ahora aplican Niebla envolvente durante 4 s cuando expiran o se consumen. La sanación de las Ráfagas de niebla de Chi-Ji aumenta un 20% y la sanación del Aliento reconfortante de Yu'lon aumenta un 500%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Casulos de Chi agora aplicam Bruma Envolvente por 4 s quando expiram ou são consumidos, a cura de Rajada de Brumas de Chi-Ji aumenta em 20%, e a cura do Sopro Reconfortante de Yu'lon aumenta em 500%.
description_blz.de_DE: Euer 'Chikokon' wendet jetzt 4 Sek. lang 'Einhüllender Nebel' an, wenn er abläuft oder verbraucht wird. Die Heilung durch Chi-Jis 'Nebelschwall' ist um 20% erhöht, und die Heilung durch Yu'lons 'Beruhigender Atem' ist um 500% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
description_blz.es_ES: Ahora, las crisálidas de chi aplican Niebla envolvente durante 4 s cuando se agotan o se consumen, y se aumenta un 20% la sanación de Racha de niebla de Chi-Ji y un 500% la de Aliento reconfortante de Yu'lon.
description_blz.fr_FR: Cocon de chi applique désormais Brume enveloppante pendant 4 s quand il arrive à expiration ou est consommé, et les soins des Bourrasques de brume de Chi Ji sont augmentés de 20 % et ceux de Souffle apaisant de Yu’lon de 500 %.
description_blz.it_IT: I Bozzoli del Chi ora applicano Nebbia Avvolgente per 4 s quando terminano o vengono consumati, le cure fornite da Folata di Venti di Chi-Ji aumentano del 20% e le cure fornite da Respiro Calmante di Yu'lon aumentano del 500%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда "Кокон ци" прекращает действовать, он применяет к цели "Окутывающий туман" на 4 сек. "Туманный поток" Чи-Цзи восполняет на 20% больше здоровья. "Успокаивающее дыхание" Юй-лун восполняет на 500% больше здоровья.
description_blz.ko_KR: 기 고치가 만료되거나 소모될 때 4초 동안 포용의 안개를 부여하며, 츠지의 안개 돌풍의 치유량이 20%만큼, 위론의 위안의 숨결의 치유량이 500%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 現在氣繭在失效或被消耗後會施加持續4秒的迷霧繚繞，且赤吉的洶湧迷霧的治療效果提高20%，玉龍的舒和吐息的治療效果提高500%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 真气之茧效果结束或被消耗时还会施加持续4秒的氤氲之雾，赤精的迷雾之风的治疗效果提高20%，玉珑的抚慰之息的治疗效果提高500%。
